net.java.jddac.jmdi.comm
Interface ObjectCoder

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArgXmlCoder, WbxmlObjectCoder
public interface ObjectCoder

Interface for objects which encode and decode messages from a list of Java objects to an array of bytes.

Method Summary
 void decode(CoderBuffer cb)
          Decodes a message list from an array of bytes.
 void encode(CoderBuffer cb)
          Encodes a message list into an array of bytes.
 

Method Detail

encode

void encode(CoderBuffer cb)
            throws java.lang.Exception
Encodes a message list into an array of bytes.

Parameters:
cb - - a CoderBuffer containing the the message list and the resulting encoding into a byte array.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if it can't encode the message list.

decode

void decode(CoderBuffer cb)
            throws java.lang.Exception
Decodes a message list from an array of bytes.

Parameters:
cb - - a CoderBuffer containing the the array of bytes and the resulting decoding into a message list.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if it can't encode the message list.
